item.description: Trivia is held at Chuck's Steakhouse in Auburn (corner of Prospect St. & Rte. 20) on Thursday evenings. Our meetup trivia team will be asked a variety of questions by the emcee on hand, and we will then submit answers, bidding a certain number of points each time. The team with the most points, wins!
item.name: Trivia at Chuck's (Hopefully no snow this time)
